resources.string: The Excuse Generator is made by DÃ˜SI Developers for the Software Development Practice paper at AUT.

The excuse generator provides the user with a large amount of different excuses. It allows the user to generate a random excuse with a simple click. Users can also custom build excuses with the Tailored Excuse function.
When pressing Random Excuse the app will generate an excuse from our database. The excuse will show on a new screen, where you can share it to your chosen social media.
On the Profile Page you can add information about yourself, this information helps us tailor excuses for your needs.

Tailored Excuse is where you get excuses based on the information given in your profile and information about the target(s). If you try to access Tailored Excuse without a profile you will be redirected to the profile page.
